page.title: 06WORKING MEN'S CLUB CHELMARSH
page.content: The club is open to anyone who is a member.These include men and women and people from all walks of life.As well as being able to have a drink, members can play on the two snooker tables and one pool table.They can also play darts, dominoes and gamble on the two gambling machines. Next door to the club there is a cricket field on which Chelmarsh play other village teams during the Summer months.There is a small wooden changing pavilion in one corner of the field.During the cricket match people from the club bring their drinks out to watch the game.After the game everyone goes inside the club for a drink.
